sub_title: 🛰🔥 Innovation Product Consultant in High-tech | Product Manager | Telco · ISP · DTV · IPTV · OTT · SaaS · Engineering · IT · Bio · Oil & Gas · Space · Sci · AI · Digital Transformation | Coursera: Author of 3 Courses
summary:
I translate complex technologies into customer language and build bridges between innovation projects, investors and customers. Result – sustainable market growth and sales increase. Dual Background MBA + PhD Business: Combined with 15+ years working as business consultant with innovation products in industries: mechanical engineering, metallurgy, oil and gas, nuclear energy, shipbuilding, aircraft construction, fintech, IT, medicine, railway transport, biotechnology, robotics, artificial intelligence, neural networks, and space stations.

The portfolio includes high-tech startups and projects from innovation departments of companies with a capitalization of 0.5 to 20 billion euros. As a result of consultations, multiple projects have attracted starting from $ 1M in investments.

Product Strategy for New Products / Product Improvements: A strategist at heart with extensive experience acting as advisor/product owner overseeing all steps of product strategy and business case development from feasibility/analytics to developing commercial and technical product vision and detailed roadmap, including business objectives, scope, and milestones from R&D to go-to-market strategy. Focused on UX and Customer Success.

Client Acquisition & Relationship Building: Networker with a strong focus on communication, building trust and value in client relationships and therefore very successful with customers. Experience working with and influencing stakeholders and decision-makers at all levels.

Strategic Vision & Instruments: Bringing a unique combination of strategic/high-level vision, leadership & communication skills, and a strong capacity to dive into any topic. This allows the company to work effectively across stakeholders and functions to deliver the implementation of the product strategy. Use of design thinking & design management, UX-design, prototyping. Also – Agile, Scrum, Kanban. Among tools – SPSS, R, Python, etc.

Books and Courses: An author of 3 courses on Coursera and 10 online courses for corporate universities. Author of 4 learning books about information design for business and technology.

school.name: Academy of National Economy under the Government of the Russian Federation
State University — Higher School of Economics

education.field_of_study: Public Relations, Advertising, and Applied Communication

projects.title: Business consulting for aviation
projects.description:
Moscow Aviation Institute (MAI, National Research University)

MAI is a leading Russian aviation institute that trains professionals for the aviation industry. 

At MAI, I conducted online consulting sessions for an audience of about 50 people. During these sessions, the audience was introduced to the technology of describing a business for investors and clients in terms of numbers and marketing. The students also studied the technology of pitching projects. Final projects were successfully presented to the committee, including investors, potential clients and partners.

projects.title: Business consulting for railway engineering corp.
projects.description:
Lokotech Group of Companies - 

I worked with Lokotech on a number of projects.
- Conducted online and offline consulting sessions, each block of sessions - 1 month. 

- During these sessions, employees of the company (in total – about 50 people or more) worked through their projects for presentation to senior management within the company and external corporate clients. During the sessions, the participants in the consultation worked out their projects for the railway industry.

- Also, as an expert, I created presentations for the departments of Lokotech, intended for the top management of the company.

Locotech manages assets that provide maintenance, repair, modernization and leasing of locomotives, production of units and parts for railway engineering enterprises. Revenue in 2019 was 1.3 billion euros.

contributors.headline: 🛰🔥 Innovation Product Consultant in High-tech | Product Manager | Telco · ISP · DTV · IPTV · OTT · SaaS · Engineering · IT · Bio · Oil & Gas · Space · Sci · AI · Digital Transformation | Coursera: Author of 3 Courses

projects.title: MIPT, Scientific projects business consultant
projects.description:
I created and lead an inter-faculty course in MIPT for scientists and entrepreneurs who want to launch their own product or idea.

Examples of scientific developments and businesses that were studied by the participants of my consulting sessions at MIPT:
- Metal-polymer micelles as containers for drug delivery. The target audience of the business is clinics, scientific laboratories and chemistry students.
- Generation of secondary radiation on expander as a possible factor in the development of capsular contracture in the treatment of breast cancer. Target audience – doctors-oncologists, doctors-radiotherapists.
- Study of the effect of acid on the molecular mobility of membrane lipids. Target audience – scientists and researchers.
- Development of a highly efficient small-sized boiler unit. Target audience – Managers and specialists of research, design, economic planning, financial, patent services.
- Cooperation management in the oil and gas complex. The target audience is the graduate qualification commission of the university.
- Preparation of dichroic coatings in vacuum. Target audience – professors, doctors of sciences.
- Obtaining active aluminum oxide with a controlled porous structure. Target audience – researchers, research chemists, students and graduate students of chemical specialties, engineers of chemical enterprises.
- Creation of potentially implantable biofuel cells based on electrodes from electrically conductive gels. Target audience – researchers, scientists.
- Blocks of automatic transfer of reserve. Target audience – organizations involved in the design and assembly of electrical cabinets.
- Grid surface scanner. Target audience – investors, company representatives.
- Investigation of the architecture of neural networks of human autobiographical memory using the NMR method. The target audience is scientists.
- Development of the EVRAZ ZSMK product portfolio. Target audience – the expert jury of the McKinsey Business Diving case championship.

projects.description:
Author of books and articles, interviewer, editor:

- 4 Books in Information Design: 40 types of slides, 4 volumes
These books were also used during my training for corporations and research universities.

- Author of over 300 publications in leading Russian business media (Vedomosti, Kommersant, RBC, etc.) on economics and real estate.

- Interviewer on the topic of business and intercultural communications and business (from 2003 to the present time she has been conducting interviews in Russia, Europe, Asia). The goal of interviews - publications in leading Russian business newspapers.

- Interviewer with top managers about their business processes, clients, goals, achievements, and numbers.

-Founder and editor-in-chief of presportal - a knowledge bank devoted to information design and inforgaphics (2011-2020).

projects.description:
At X5 Retail Group, as an invited consultant, I trained the participants in a consulting session to public speaking at an internal conference in a company with several hundred participants. We worked through not only a public speech, but information for it. We got rid of "water" and unnecessary texts, worked with the structure of the performance, designed its direction and timing.

Capitalization: 7.4 billion euros.

projects.title: Business consulting sessions for Rusnano corporation (nanotechnology)
projects.description:
Nanotechnology сorporation Rusnano (https://en.rusnano.com/). 

I worked with nanotechnology corporation Rusnano on several projects.

- Conducted consulting sessions (1 month) at the Department of Technological Entrepreneurship of Rusnano at MIPT. As a result, students prepared projects of technology businesses for investors and some of them raised investment.

- In Rusnano, I have implemented a project to create 3 online courses for introducing technology projects to investors and clients. My tasks as a project leader included: write a complete specification and plans for 3 online courses; to develop test assignments and tests according to the standards of Coursers; in the studio of the Lectorium with a team of operators, record a video with yourself as the author of the course; view the footage.

- By order of Rusnano, I prepared a presentation for one of their divisions.
Rusnano implements state policy for the development of the nanoindustry in Russia, acting as a co-investor in nanotechnology projects, which have substantial economic or social potential.

projects.title: Metallurgy corporation: business consulting
projects.description:
Metalloinvest. Capitalization: 23.5 billion euros.

About 100 heads of Metalloinvest divisions underwent long-term business training organized by the Moscow Institute of Steel and Alloys. I was one of the consultants in this project. I worked with several groups of directors of 20 people each. 

During my consulting sessions, each of the participants worked out their project in numbers and described it for presentation to the top management of the company. The goal is to attract investments within the company for the development of the project. As a result, the top management of the company applauded their division directors when, after my consulting sessions, they presented their projects. 

The top management of the company noted that the quality of the information provided and the nature of the presentation of the project has increased significantly. Many projects have received investments.

projects.title: Online course in MIPT: from science to business
projects.description:
I created and lead an online course in MIPT for scientists from many Russian cities. 

Examples of scientific developments and businesses that were studied by the participants of my online consulting sessions at MIPT:

- Stand for measuring parameters of brushless motors. Target audience – corporate clients, customers.
- Development of a methodology for the formalized selection of technological operations when designing a technological process for manufacturing a "case" type part. Target audience – conference participants, commission.
- The effect of a pharmacologically active composition on the reparative capacity of the oral mucosa after a course of treatment for combined trauma. Target audience – dentists.
- Calculation of the gravitational field of asteroids. Target audience – Department of Mathematical Modelling, Moscow Institute of Physics and Technology.
- Development of rapid environmental tests based on carbon quantum dots. Target audience - scientists, entrepreneurs.
- Using VSAT technology to organize communication on the move. Target audience – technical specialists, system engineers.
- Biologically motivated algorithms for finding the extremum of natural fields by robotic complexes. Target audience – scientists, researchers.
- Optimising the operation of gravel pack wells. Target audience – the national industry of Serbia, subsidiaries of Gazpromoil STC.
Improvement of systems for the development of deposits of water-oil zones using horizontal wells. Target audience – members of the state attestation commission, scientists.
- Coherence of oscillations in the basal ganglia of the brain. Target audience – researchers involved in the development of approaches to the diagnosis of neurodegenerative diseases.
- Mechanisms of platelet integrin activation by shear flow. Target audience – scientists, professors of the Department of Biophysics.

projects.title: Consultant in Business Incubator, HSE
projects.description:
Business Incubator of National Research University “Higher School of Economics” 

The business incubator of the Higher School of Economics is one of the leading Moscow business incubators, where entrepreneurs regularly present their ideas, products and services to investors.

As an invited business consultant, I performed a series of works on preparing entrepreneurs for a meeting with investors:
- Consulting sessions on describing the business in numbers. They represented the company, product portfolio, clients and investors in numbers.

- Consulting sessions for entrepreneurs on speeches and answers to possible questions from investors.

- The result is dozens of projects from different business areas that were presented to investors. Many of them have attracted money, clients and partners.

projects.title: Consulting sessions for engineers and nuclear physicists
projects.description:
National Research Nuclear University "MEPHI" (Moscow Engineering Physics Institute) is the leading nuclear university in Russia that prepares professionals for the nuclear industry.

At MEPHI, I conducted consulting sessions (1 month) for engineering students and nuclear physicists. The purpose of these sessions is to prepare student projects for submission to the attestation commission. 

The consultation sessions resulted in technical projects worked out in terms of numbers and logic for submission to the commission. One of my students from MEPHI, after my course of consultations, presented the project to investors and received $ 1,000,000 investment for the development of a new type of glucometer.

projects.title: Business consultant for nuclear corporation
projects.description:
State Atomic Energy Corporation Rosatom, Moscow

The directors of the innovation business division of the nuclear corporation Rosatom were trained at the business school in Moscow. About 70 people. As an invited business consultant, I conducted consulting sessions for directors of divisions. 

My task was to show the best way to present complex projects in the field of nuclear energy innovations and other technological solutions. Each participant in the consultation session worked out his project using my technology. 

The result is projects ready for presentation to the company's top management. The goal of the directors of divisions is to attract investments within the company for the implementation of their projects. Many projects have been successfully presented and got investment.

Rosatom is a multi-industry holding comprising assets in power engineering, machine engineering and construction, among others. Having competencies across the entire nuclear fuel cycle, the corporation boasts the largest foreign project portfolio in the world with 35 power units at different stages of implementation in 12 countries.

projects.title: Business consultant: Aircraft construction corp
projects.description:
The United Aircraft Corporation (UAC). Capitalization: 4 billion euros.

The United Aircraft Corporation held a competition among its divisions in many cities of Russia among aviation engineers. These engineers had to present their ideas, developments and projects to the top management of the corporation. The authors of the best projects were invited to Moscow for the final preparation, during which I conducted 16-hour consulting sessions for them. 

In my consulting sessions, aeronautical engineers worked through their projects from a business and target audience point of view. Each of them, using my technology, described the project with the help of numbers and, as a result, made a clear proposal for internal investors and top management of the company. 

As a result, many projects were noted by the jury as outstanding and interesting. The best of them got investment and other resources needed for project implementation.

projects.description:
Far Eastern Center for Shipbuilding and Ship Repair. 

Employees of this company participated in my 16-hour consulting sessions in Moscow. The result of participation in the session was a project worked out from the point of view of business logic and intended for the target audience specified by the author of the project. The project was successfully approved by top-management.

It is a part of the Rosneft Group Companies and includes the main ship repair and shipbuilding production facilities of the Russian Far Eastern Federal District.

contributors.headline: 🛰🔥 Innovation Product Consultant in High-tech | Product Manager | Telco · ISP · DTV · IPTV · OTT · SaaS · Engineering · IT · Bio · Oil & Gas · Space · Sci · AI · Digital Transformation | Coursera: Author of 3 Courses

profile_positions.description:
Track record in supporting my clients to receive investments:
o      70% of startups obtained seed investment with a range from €50k up to €1M.
o      90% of large corporate projects obtained board approval and funding from €1-10M+, projects mostly focused on the implementation of new technologies in oil & gas, metallurgy, railways & aviation sectors.
o      Led 100+ large-scale consulting projects in 12 years. 
o	Regularly hosted corporate training for clients (approx. 40 per year).

Product Ownership & Business Development: How I raise a market share with a limited budget.
The thesis of my Ph.D. degree in business was about creating new markets or market shares with low costs through a cloud of connected projects. I developed an integrated ecosystem to reach market leadership for Sci&Tech Product Consultancy. I developed the business and generated a steady flow of new clients and revenues for Sci&Tech Product Consultancy. 

Create Product & Go-to-Market Strategy: How I transfer products from Project to Market sales.
My passion is to help technological products implement go-to-market strategies and raise their market shares. My job starts with an assessment: what is the readiness of the product for the go-to-market? If the product is ready, then I devise the internal and external product strategy for innovative products with a focus on go-to-market. The strategy always includes clear business objectives, scope, requirements & success criteria.  
o	Clients from High Tech & IT: Rusnano – created 3 products for sale. 
o	MIPT startups in high tech & IT
o	Clients from Telecom: Tele2 & Kcell – I provided 10 consulting sessions for marketing departments. 
o	For MTS I created 3 online products for internal use.
o	Clients from the nuclear industry: Rusatom, MEPHI – I helped to translate high-tech into market language.
o	Railway: RZD, Locotech – I helped engineers to prepare products for receiving internal investments. 
o	Clients from Avia construction: OAK, MAI.
profile_positions.title: Product Owner | Business Development | Go-to-Market Strategy | Consulting Innovation Companies

profile_positions.description:
Development of Innovation Product Marketing Strategy
After analysing market research, I elaborate on commercial and technical strategies for innovative products. These strategies are always connected with customer success. I am the customer advocate in the development of products. Besides, I am responsible for Business Development, Strategic Alliances & Partnership Management including qualification and selection of external product development partners, working with the partnerships team on co-selling activities with global partners, generating leads and opportunities to fuel future growth. 

Partnership Management and Customer Relations: How I build strong relationships with stakeholders
My communication experience started from working in mass media, where I collaborated with PR professionals, GR, and other stakeholders. Media and corporate communication were an important part of my career.

Development of Innovation Product Marketing Strategy
o	Defining a commercial and technical strategy for innovative products based on market research.
o	Responsible for customer success by being the customer advocate in the development of products.
o	Business Development, Strategic Alliances & Partnership Management including qualification and selection of external product development partners, work with partnerships team on co-selling activities with global partners, generating leads and opportunities to fuel growth. 

Partnership Management and Customer Relations
o	Relationship building and stakeholder communication concerning product launches, partnerships, and collaborations (e.g., leading business / corporate dev. initiatives).
o	Strong relationship-building capabilities, long-term partnership focus.
o	Qualification and selection of international product development partners.
o	Work with partnerships team on co-selling activities with global partners, generating leads and opportunities that fuel future growth.
o	Execute strategic projects to improve partner performance.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Director | Development of Innovation Product Marketing Strategy | Partnership Management

profile_positions.description:
Product Roadmap Development
o	Leading the planning and prioritization to enable teams and leaders to make quality decisions.
o	Strong focus on customer success and empathy.

Agile & Scrum Project Management
o	Leading cross-functional team collaboration through design sprints to prototype solutions for customers. 
o	Managed both the long-term product planning (Roadmap, Product Portfolio) as well as the short-term planning in 2 weeks sprint cycles (Agile, Scrum, Kanban).

Design Management & Design Thinking
o	Development of projects by using a design thinking approach and cycles.
o	Use of design management instruments for planning and development of projects.

Consulting Innovation Companies & Tech Startups: How I translate technologies into customer language.
My focus is on building bridges between technological projects, customers, and investors. My consulting starts with productive interaction with senior stakeholders. My main expertise is to make a complicated technology clear for the market. I start with data analysis and observing the project architecture, and finish with customer success and UX logic of the whole experience of interacting with the technological product. I incorporate this analysis into the product roadmap and go-to-market strategy.

Training Top Management, Department Heads, and Internal Teams: How I deliver knowledge and skills
I have 12+ years of experience in providing high-quality corporate trainings for top managers, marketing, and engineering teams. All trainings are based on my own school and expertise developed in practice. I have provided hundreds of offline and dozens of online trainings with a rate of 5 out of 5. As a result of my training teams and projects received internal and external investment. I also organized 5 international forums gathering up to 150 attendees and 15 speakers for each event enabling client companies to get media attention and position themselves as leaders in their field.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager: Product Roadmap Development | Agile & Scrum | Design Management & Design Thinking

profile_positions.description:
mipt.ru/english/  MIPT is the leading physics and technology university in Russia. 

Course Author, Lecturer & Trainer  
Track record in supporting my clients to receive investments:
o	70% of startups obtained seed investment with a range from €50k up to €1M.
o	Authored 3 courses on Coursera on technology projects followed by 2400+ students and rated 4.3 out of 5. Developed 10 online courses for corporate universities and authored 4 online learning books about information design for business and technology.

Course Leader: How I Developed and Lead University Course for most motivated students
I led a university course in MIPT for technological and scientific entrepreneurs. During the course, I supported tech entrepreneurs in innovation, science & technology through training focused on go-to-market strategy for innovation. Some projects got investment, partners, and support; many are developing nowadays. For entering my course students needed to pass exams and spend around 2 hours for them. 

Developed and Lead University Courses on Campus
o	Working as a business consultant focusing on supporting entrepreneurs in innovation, science & technology through training focused on go-to-market strategy for innovation.
o	Bringing extensive experience in teaching and coaching in both academia and a strong focus on communications through 5 years in business journalism and mass media. 
o	Some projects got investment, partners, and support; many are developing nowadays.

Developed and Lead Online University Courses
o	Created and led an online course attended by scientists & innovators from technical universities from over 20 cities. 
o	Creator and leader of educational programs, having developed the content and strategy for various E-Learnings courses for corporations and digital assets for the B2B platform.
o	Led all aspects of the development of a MIPT program for the Coursera platform on the presentation of technological projects to customers and investors.
profile_positions.title: Consultant Innovation & Technology | Learning lead and trainer | E-learning Development and Content

profile_positions.description:
https://www.msu.ru/en/

Creator, lecturer, and trainer at an interfaculty course on business ideas pitch for students of mathematics, physics, chemistry, biology, economics, law, philology, and other faculties of Moscow State University.

Science Park of Moscow State University (http://www.sciencepark.ru/en/)

In the Science Park of Moscow State University, as an invited consultant, I worked with participants in the programs "Formula Engineering", "Biotech" and others. In these programs, students of leading Moscow universities learn to develop their technology business and prepare proposals for investors to attract investments starting from $1M. Also, the majority of the projects found partners and clients. Each group consisted of 40-50 people. 

Driving Innovations: Consulted High-Tech Startups in Incubation & Acceleration
o	Developed industry-specific incubation programs for technological entrepreneurs. 
o	Focused on translating complex innovations into business formats that impactfully showcase value to investors, customers, and stakeholders in the accelerator.
o	Led faculties with the main goal of turning scientific and technological ideas into business. 

Among my tasks:
- To acquaint program participants with the logic of describing a business for potential investors and partners.

- Conduct practical consulting sessions, during which each participant, on paper and using a calculator, calculates more than 50 numbers and parameters for their business. We count indicators in numbers: business, product, needs of different target audiences, and business customers.

- For high-tech and complex products, I give a technology that allows entrepreneurs to explain to an investor or any person the essence of a high-tech complex product or service in a few minutes.

- The result of my work is business plans and a description of the business in the language of numbers, ready for presentation to clients and investors.
profile_positions.title: Business Consultant | Innovation & Technology | Learning lead and trainer | Trainer and Coach
